testcase.name: Click on one of the christmas biscuit
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Homepage...............................................passed When User types Biscuit in searchbox and clicks magnifyingglass.............passed Then User should be able to get all the biscuit products....................passed Given User is on the result page............................................passed When User clicks on christmas button........................................passed Then User should be able to see all the christmas products..................passed Given User is on the webpage where user can see all the christmas products..passed When User clicks on add to basket button for mince pies.....................passed Then User should be able to add the product into the basket.................passed
